channel.title: How do i make npc's have hp?
channel.description: how do i make my npc have hp on the standard hybrid scaPE??? bcoz wen i summon them by going "::npc 1" it comes up but they only have 0 hp.. i want them to have like 200+ how do i chang it??please help
